subject: Curling
lead_paragraph: Canada won the women’s world curling championships, beating the surprise finalist China, 7-4, in the final at Vernon, Canada. It was Canada’s 15th world title since 1979. China, which was first after qualifying, became the first Asian nation to get on to the podium.
